ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESGOUser.GID AS GID, ESGOUser.UserID AS UserID, ESGOUser.Name AS Name, (case when ESGOUser.StringField1 is null then '1' else '0' end) AS UserRole FROM ESGOUser AS ESGOUser INNER JOIN ESGOUserSite AS FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser ON ESGOUser.GID = FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser.fUserGID LEFT JOIN ESFITradeAccount AS FK_ESGOUserSite_ESFITradeAccount ON FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser.fTradeAccountGID = FK_ESGOUserSite_ESFITradeAccount.GID WHERE (ESGOUser.GID = ##(ESUSERGID)) AND (FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser.fCompanyCode = ##(ESCOMPANY)) AND (FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser.fCompanySiteGID = ##(ESBRANCHGID))
